dcterms:creator: C. Lu
J. Shi
J. Jia
dcterms:description: CUHK Avenue is collected at the Avenue of Chinese University of Hong Kong. It is populated with 16 training and 21 test videos split into 15328 frames for training and 15324 for testing each with a resolution of 640 x 360 pixels. Avenueâ€™s test set contains frame-level masks for ground truth annotations. Fourteen distinct events are classified as abnormal in this dataset like loitering, running, romping, pushing a bike, moving towards camera, and throwing a paper or bag.
dcterms:title: CUHK Avenue

dcterms:creator: W. Li
V. Mahadevan
N. Vasconcelos
dcterms:description: UCSD Ped1 dataset comprises 34 training and 36 test videos, which are split into frames of 238x158 pixel resolution. The test set videos are fragmented into 200 frames. Abnormal events in this dataset include the presence of car, bicycle, wheelchair, skateboard, and walking on grass or moving in wrong direction across a walkway.
dcterms:title: UCSD Ped1

dcterms:creator: W. Li
V. Mahadevan
N. Vasconcelos
dcterms:description: UCSD Ped2 dataset contains 16 training and 12 test videos whose frames have a resolution of 360x240 pixels. Each video in the test set is split into a varying number of 120, 150 and 180 frames. Abnormal events in this dataset include the presence of car, bicycle, wheelchair, skateboard, and walking on grass or moving in wrong direction across a walkway.
dcterms:title: UCSD Ped2
